title: Building a Bow Trap
brief: Construct a lethal trap that shoots arrows at prey using a triggered bow mechanism.
steps: Step 1: Build a functional bow and anchor it securely to the ground using stakes or pegs.
Step 2: Adjust aiming point carefully while anchoring the bow to ensure accurate shot placement.
Step 3: Lash a toggle stick to a trigger stick, position between two upright stakes driven into ground.
Step 4: Pull bowstring back and engage it with the toggle stick when trigger is in firing position.
Step 5: Place a catch stick between toggle stick and a ground stake.
Step 6: Run trip wire from catch stick around stakes and across game trail, tie off securely.
Step 7: Cut aiming notch in bow to help direct arrow toward target area.
warnings: This is a lethal trap - approach with extreme caution and only from the rear!
Extremely dangerous to humans - mark location clearly if in group survival situation.
Arrow will fire with lethal force when trip wire is disturbed.
Test trigger mechanism thoroughly before setting in active area.
